snippet.title: FRU Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Official Site: http://frugame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FRUGAME/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FRU_GAME
Presskit: http://frugame.com//presskit

FRU is a puzzle platformer that features an innovative use of Kinect, in which your silhouette becomes a "portal" between two worlds.

You will find yourself solving puzzles by strategically positioning your body, swimming inside your silhouette, awkwardly tiptoeing... physical interaction meets traditional platforming in FRU!

Be precise, be careful, take on a funny pose, but most importantly, be creative with your body! Every level can be solved in multiple ways, with different poses. What sort of creative solutions can you come up with?
